mainHero.title: The future is
mainHero.subtitle: type C
mainHero.description: Level up your embedded game with a range of type C development boards. Fire up your embedded boards with our type C supported microcontrollers.

items.title: A plug n play template
items.description: Just edit the config.json file with details about your company and voila your beautiful state of the art landing page is ready to go live! Remember to also update your assets, add any images you want to show to /assets/images and link them in the config.json

features.title: A Quinch Systems Venture
features.subtitle: SystemOnC
features.description: At SystemOnC we have a passionate team of engineers and scientists focused towards developing cutting-edge, low-power series of modules and development boards each one of them supports type C connector. We have developed Type-C USB-to-TTL Converter, type C enabled ESP32, type C NodeMCU,  type C Arduino boards etc. We are committed to offering solutions which are secure, robust and power-efficient. We are inviting the embedded community to empower their development journey with our type C supported modules and development boards.

items.name: Address
items.description: 20/ 2, James Long Sarani, Diamond Park, Joka, Kolkata, West Bengal 700104

sections.name: ABC
sections.content: It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout. The point of using Lorem Ipsum is that it has a more-or-less normal distribution of letters, as opposed to using 'Content here, content here', making it look like readable English.
